tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Arati genuinely listens to your issues patiently and prescribes effective and easy to follow treatment for whatever your issue might  be. She even adjusts your treatment as the days pass (if needed) to ensure your issues are taken care off - based on what personally works for you as opposed to a generic treatment that might not necessarily be enough. It's been 3 days since I've been on her treatment and I already feel much better. She is also very considerate about all your follow up questions and concerns. I genuinely thank Practo for connecting me to such an amazing dentist who I'm sure I wouldn't have found if not for this platform. However, my only complaint is with the glitch practo seems to be experiencing.  I fixed the appointment on 18.5.21 thru Practo and also consulted the doctor as scheduled.  But despite consultation Practo app shows the consultation as it never happened and has also refunded my consultation fee.  Something appears to be wrong with Practo app. I do not know whether others also have had the same experience. But I am highly satisfied as the doctor not only stuck to the appointment but also made follow up calls through WhatsApp and video. I 10/10 recommend Dr. Arati for all your dental issues and I can't wait for the pandemic situation to come under control so I can go visit her in person and help me long term. :)
reply_text: Thank you so much for your valuable feedback

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Visited doctor for left jaw pain and left cheek discomfort. I was examined thoroughly and was given detailed explanation of the cause. I was referred to oral surgeon for my left cheek discomfort and the best part is, doctor consulted the oral surgeon herself and fixed and appointment with him the very next day (So I didn’t have to wander looking for a good oral surgeon) I met the oral surgeon in Dr Arati’s clinic as she had arranged for my appointment (mind you this is not a general clinic, it’s fully equipped to perform surgeries as well) I was diagnosed and was advised medication which is very very simple. Dr Arati DID NOT CHARGE FOR HER CONSULTATION AS WELL FOR MY SECOND VISIT THOUGH I MET HER AND SHOWED MY SCANNED REPORT OF MY TEETH AND THE ORAL SURGEON IN HER CLINIC. Not to forget to mention this.. she has taken complete precautions keeping in mind of this ongoing COVID-19 pandemic. You will will be completely sanitised from head to toe, your temperature is checked , pulse check is done, you will be given gloves, head cap, foot cap and complete body cover so that you are not infected. I would recommend Dr Arati to anyone who has issues with their dentals.
reply_text:
Thank u so much
This is a very valuable feedback

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Cavity Filling,Tooth Coloured Fillings,
review:
Dr. Arati is extremely proficient in her work and understanding. She is quick to understand your problem and gives the patient sufficient time to help them navigate to the required dental solution.

I had a wide variety of problem. Starting with RCT of 3 tooth. She prioritised my dental procedures in the best possible way. 

There's hardly any waiting time, thanks to her excellent organisation and coordination.

She is amazing at her dentistry. She is my go to person for any dental problem. Thank you, Dr. Arati.
reply_text: Thank you Yash fir your valuable feedback

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Such an amazing Dentist. She clearly explained the problem, gave me suggestions and explained the process. Post procedure, she explained the Do's and Dont's I need to take care of.

From next day on, she constantly follows up on how I am doing and need any help. Such a helpful and friendly dentist.

Also the clinic is maintained in a clean fashion. Patients are sanitized before entering and given required kits to enter. Also post procedure, the place is sanitized before the next patient comes in.

Highly recommended !!
reply_text: Thanks for your valuable feedback

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: My mom had tooth pain and face swelling that became severe in the night. I was very happy to consult with Dr Arati who responded immediately after booking the consultation. She listened patiently, diagnosed and explained the issue to us patiently. She was also available to follow-up to check on my mother's condition, which was a very reassuring experience. Thank you Dr. Aarti.The Practo app however has some issue, where we are unable to mark the consultation as completed, even after few hours. I hope they can fix the same soon.
reply_text: Thank u for your valuable feedback

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Toothache Remedies,Broken Teeth,Implant / RCT,Oral Rehabilitation,Dental Surgery,
review: Doc has over 25 years of experience is very friendly and an expert and her capable team - explain all the issues while providing immediate affordable solutions. Toothwala is a quaint little clinic tucked away in Basavanagudi. I went there with my mom as both of us had severe teeth issues that were ignored for a long time. In less than a week, the process has started with antibiotics helping get rid of infections and now we've got implants and will soon have good looking, functional teeth! The dental clinic is well-maintained and hygiene is their priority. I would definitely recommend visiting Dr. Aarthi for any tooth issues and rectifications.
reply_text: Thanks Banu for your valuable feedback

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Visited Dr.Arati for RCT procedure. Was highly impressed with the Covid precautions taken here. Before you even enter the clinic door you are sprayed with the disinfectant which is completely safe, once you enter you are provided with a head gear, gloves, gear for your feet and a body gear.Arati Mam will listen to your problems patiently and does an initial analysis of your teeth,  then takes an X-ray on both the sides of your Jaw. She then explains the problems in detail and also indicates if there are any problems that may arise in future.Coming to the RCT procedure, it was completely painless. Did not even know when the procedure was over. Highlight is the post follow-up by Dr.Arati. It is really a great gesture which gives comfort and confidence.I would highly recommend Dr. Arati for any of your dental problems and rest assured, you are in the best and safe hands!
reply_text:
Thank you so much Anshul, for the detailed feedback.  
Glad that your I could resolve your problem .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We were apprehensive of visiting a dentist due to the Pandemic. When we approached Toothwala for an appointment, we were asked to fill up a health declaration online before visiting the clinic and we were sent a video of the covid compliant clinic and the protocols followed. . That gave us some assurance of safety. When we actually visited the clinic we were pleasantly surprised to see that every possible precautions were taken to ensure the patients' safety. 
And Dr. Aarti Sundar Rajan understood my problem, and explained the best way to treat it. 

Extremely satisfied with the treatment and experience at Toothwala, Basavanagudi, Bangalore
reply_text:
Thank u so much for your valuable feedback
We are a COVID compliant centre ans we do care for our patient’s safety

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Tooth Decay,Wisdom Teeth,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Crowded Teeth,Impacted Tooth,
review: I visited Arati Ma'am for my dental issues, i had a lot of issues with my tooth. Ma'am took an x-ray and clearly explained me all the issues that needed to be addressed. I had to remove Wisdom tooth, Root canal, remove previously kept metal filling and Cap fitting. Ma'am did each one of them as informed. Ma'am was so friendly, positive and guided me properly. i am totally satisfied with my treatment and the overall safety at the clinic. each time, i was given cap, sox, gloves and a kit for my trearment.

review: Dr. Arati is expert in her area and explains the problem in layman terms so that we know what's the issue and what will the treatment do.Also she does not just focuses on the problem told but scans the entire teeeth set to identify any upcoming problem.She also doesn't just tells to get the treatment from her but she insists on getting the treatment from any place but keeps the wellbeing of the patient on top priority.If you are looking for proper treatment, do visit Dr. Arati Sunderajan.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Dental Fillings,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Surgery,
review: Dr. Arati has treated for my mother - Denture, for my wife - bracing, for me - RCT, capping and Surgery and for my son - filling... She is one of the best doctor i have ever seen and I strongly recommend this doctor for any dental issues.  She gives an detailed explain about the problem, also provides the suitable solutions according to your health conditions.  We liked the way she explained.  When it comes to charges it is really reasonable for the having such experienced doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Trust and confidence are two words to describe the experience. Dr.Arthi and her team are excellent Dentists. She clearly explained the problem, gave me suggestions and explained the process. Got tooth extraction, implant and root canal done. Post procedure, she ensured that I was comfortable.

It is nothing less than an achievement for me to go back to the dentist without fear. Thank you Dr.Arthi and team for making me achieve this.
reply_text: Thank your Chaitra for your valuable feedback

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
It was good time with the doctor. She was able to listen to me carefully. And I felt comfortable because I can speak with her in mother tongue. She has helped me by giving indepth information about my cause and temporary solution as well. And also gave light on how much severe the issue of mine and what need to do. Thank you for being helpful mam. 
Anyway draw back of online consultation is not able to examine us physically which most of the patients need.
reply_text:
Thank u for ur valuable feedback 
Yes I do agree with u that the only drawback of online consultation is that there is no way to in person do a physical examination
But that’s how much we can do in an online consultation 
Will connect the maxillo facial surgeon to help resolve ur issue
Regards 
Dr. Arati

review: Doctor is very kind I was very happy with the treatment. She won't give unnecessary treatments. Her clinic is very neat and clean. Sanitation is done to every patient and waiting area also. tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: One of the bad experience that I had.  She is not responsive and does not even have the sympathy to answer the patient problem. *** **** ********* *** ****** Even during the treatment she was busy in other phone calls ******* **** ***** *** ***** ******** I would never suggest this doctor to anyone as I was literally scared to be in that place for a longer time.
reply_text: Dear Manasvi I think after the appointment was booked by you , I personally called u and interacted with u. I even sent the covid screening form to be filled by u and shared a video of the protective measures followed for covid.  I checked your mouth and took diagnostic xrays for the problem that u expressed and the other tooth below that was showing a deep dental decay. Even my clinic staff was polite and explained the needful to u. There was an emergency call of a patient that i had to attend when i was explaining to u as that patient had undergone a surgery and needed some clarifications  to be cleared on priority. As per the condition of your tooth i have explained the procedures to u. So i think I was polite and completely explained the treatment in depth. but still it seems strange to me that u were not able to   understand the procedures explained in such depth.

reply_text:

review:
Visited here for root canal for 2 tooth. RCT was Done for 1 tooth, it was handled roughly *** *** ********* *** ******* There is sensitivity again and when saying this to doctor, she keeps saying it is normal.
The other tooth, rct could have been possible but was recommended for a implant stating there is some infection in the teeth and it has to be removed.
**** ******* **** ********Overall handling was rough, *** ********** ****** *** close to 45000 rupees wasted.
Please do not visit, * *** ***** ******* ******** **** ******* ******* ****** Please do not visit. NOT RECOMMENDED!
reply_text:
Dear patient
Firstly the implant failure is only because of the rejection of the body
The process was done twice to help and make sure that there should not be a failure due to any lapse from the clinic end 
U need to understand that even though the best materials are used there is something called as body acceptance and rejection 
In your case it was a body rejection 
We do our best to help conserve the structure and provide the best

review: Went for severe tooth ache and swelling. The only option given was removal of 2 teeths and implants. Went for a second opinion and got to know there are other options as well for the problem. Also only medication given was divon plus and an ointment.
reply_text:
The medication of Divon plus was given so that u decide the treatment and the we start with the required antibiotics
It was not that antibiotics were not supposed to be given
As far as the options it is the perspective and out look of a dentist and the prognosis expected 
And every doctor as a different approach towards the treatment
Anyways good that u have got it done in ur satisfied way
